body: 画风这么漂亮的奥特曼你tm就不能画个正常的后宫漫么

This is just bad. To be honest, the artist is not that shitty in previous works mainly because there's less women in them that it gives you focus on their features despite the fact that they all look the same at a glance. If it wasn't for the helmets, I wouldn't be able to differentiate the women apart. I get that all you need to see in a fap material is fucking these days but facial recognition does still play a role. 

That said, I'll give the author credit for not taking the helmets off. It curbs the difficulty at the very least and potentially show a sign that the artist is aware of his method's shortcomings.
